mapper.sql: SELECT id, username, password, nickname, role, enable, photo, email, description, createtime
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ib_user ( uid, username, password, nickname, role, enable, photo, email, description, createtime ) VALUE ( #{uid}, #{username},#{password},#{nickname},#{role},#{enable},#{photo},#{email},#{description},default )
mapper.select: SELECT email FROM ib_user WHERE email = #{email}
